EmailTemplate.name: AIA ID Card Rejection emails
EmailTemplate.subject: {!ID_Card__c.Name} for {!ID_Card__c.Implementation__c} has been Rejected. Needs more information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!ID_Card__c.Name} for {!ID_Card__c.Implementation__c} has been Rejected. You may navigate to the ID Card by clicking on the link below {!ID_Card__c.Link}
AIA Automation
